channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: No Safety in Numbers
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Edward S. Williams)
item.description: Off in the country, cut off by the storm, Rose had heard the radio account of the hold-up and murder. And now she was sure that one of the men in her house was the killer. But which was it?
